001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import java.time.ZoneId;
004import java.util.function.Function;
005
006import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
007
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProvider;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProviderRef;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.ServiceRegistry;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.ConvertParameter;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.KeyParameter;
017import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.PassThroughParameter;
018import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.DefaultFormatterConfig.StandardPropertyFunction;
019import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
020import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
021import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
022
023/**
024 * Configures Logback style pattern encoders and offers provision with the URI scheme
025 * {@value PatternEncoder#PATTERN_SCHEME}.
026 */
027@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
028public final class PatternConfigurator implements Configurator {
029
030        /**
031         * For service loader to call.
032         */
033        public PatternConfigurator() {
034                // for service loader.
035        }
036
037        @Override
038        public boolean configure(LogConfig config, Pass pass) {
039                var services = config.serviceRegistry();
040                String n = ServiceRegistry.DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME;
041                services.putIfAbsent(PatternRegistry.class, n, PatternRegistry::of);
042                services.putIfAbsent(PatternCompiler.class, n, () -> PatternCompiler.of(b -> {
043                }).provide(n, config));
044                config.encoderRegistry().register(PatternEncoder.PATTERN_SCHEME, new PatternEncoderProvider());
045                return true;
046        }
047
048        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternEncoderBuilder", prefix = LogProperties.ENCODER_PREFIX)
049        static LogProvider<LogEncoder> provideEncoder(@KeyParameter String name, String pattern,
050                        @PassThroughParameter @Nullable PatternCompiler patternCompiler) {
051                return (n, config) -> {
052                        var compiler = patternCompiler;
053                        if (compiler == null) {
054                                compiler = PatternCompiler.of(b -> {
055                                }).provide(name, config);
056                        }
057                        return LogEncoder.of(compiler.compile(pattern));
058                };
059        }
060
061        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternConfigBuilder", prefix = PatternConfig.PATTERN_CONFIG_PREFIX)
062        static PatternConfig provideFormatterConfig(@KeyParameter String name, //
063                        @ConvertParameter("convertZoneId") @Nullable ZoneId zoneId, //
064                        @Nullable String lineSeparator, //
065                        @Nullable Boolean ansiDisabled, //
066                        @PassThroughParameter @Nullable Function<String, @Nullable String> propertyFunction) {
067                PatternConfig dc = PatternConfig.of();
068                ansiDisabled = ansiDisabled == null ? dc.ansiDisabled() : ansiDisabled;
069                lineSeparator = lineSeparator == null ? dc.lineSeparator() : lineSeparator;
070                zoneId = zoneId == null ? dc.zoneId() : zoneId;
071                propertyFunction = propertyFunction == null ? StandardPropertyFunction.INSTANCE : propertyFunction;
072                return new SimpleFormatterConfig(zoneId, lineSeparator, ansiDisabled, propertyFunction);
073
074        }
075
076        static ZoneId convertZoneId(@Nullable String zoneId) {
077                var dc = PatternConfig.of();
078                ZoneId zoneId_ = zoneId == null ? dc.zoneId() : ZoneId.of(zoneId);
079                return zoneId_;
080        }
081
082}
083
084record PatternEncoderProvider() implements LogEncoder.EncoderProvider {
085
086        @Override
087        public LogProvider<LogEncoder> provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
088                return (name, config) -> {
089                        PatternEncoderBuilder b = new PatternEncoderBuilder(name);
090                        b.fromProperties(config.properties(), ref);
091                        return b.build().provide(name, config);
092                };
093        }
094
095}
